channel.title: Server Status Checkers aren't working for my server? Blocking ip or something?
channel.description:
Okay so my server is online, people can connect and such, but for some reason ALL server status checkers keep saying we're offline? I don't get why seeing as how we're on a 24/7 VPS host with the firewall turned off..
See for yourself we're online: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=UYY6P768]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=UYY6P768[/url]
But the Server status checkers all say we're: [img]http://www.google.com/tools/statusimg.php?ip=89.46.36.164&port=43594[/img] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/15ye4h.pngip=89.46.36.164&port=43594[/img]

item.title: Server Status Checkers aren't working for my server? Blocking ip or something?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Okay so my server is online, people can connect and such, but for some reason ALL server status checkers keep saying we’re offline?
I don’t get why seeing as how we’re on a 24/7 VPS host with the firewall turned off…

See for yourself we’re online:
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=UYY6P768

But the Server status checkers all say we’re:
